      • registerNewProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/project/new",
                method=POST)
protected void registerNewProject(@RequestParam(value="parentProjectId",required=false)
                                                                                                     String parentProjectId,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="projectJSONString",required=true)
                                                                                                     String projectJSONString,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="commitMessage",required=true)
                                                                                                     String commitMessage,
                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Handle user's request to register a new WISE5 project. Registers the new project in DB and returns the new project ID If the parentProjectId is specified, the user is requesting to copy that project

        Parameters:

        commitMessage - commit message, can be null
        projectJSONString - a valid-JSON string of the project

      • getFilesInDirectory

        public static File[] getFilesInDirectory(File directory)
        Get the file names in the directory. Permission checks should be done before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory containing the files
        Returns:
        an array of files in the directory

      • copyProjectDirectory

        public static String copyProjectDirectory(File srcDir)
                                   throws IOException
        Given a path to curriculum base directory and the path to the project directory that we want to copy, copies the directory and returns String the path to the freshly copied directory.
        Parameters:
        srcDir - the directory of the project we are copying, e.g. "/tomcat/webapps/curriculum/5"
        Returns:
        the path to the new project
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • copy

        public static void copy(File src,
                        File dest)
                 throws IOException
        Copies the given File src to the given File dest. If the src is a directories, recursively copies the contents of the directory into dest.
        Parameters:
        src - directory to copy from
        dest - directory to copy to
        Throws:
        IOException
